name: Roots of Evil (guilty_D_games, JesusLopezPujazon, Lodur, Lioneking)
name_original: Roots of Evil (guilty_D_games, JesusLopezPujazon, Lodur, Lioneking)
description:
Game made for the Global Game Jam february 2023 and Málaga Jam XV.

Howard encontró un viejo libro donde se describe una invocación, Debe mantener 12 almas confundidas a medianoche en la habitación preparada para el ritual.  Howard hará lo que pueda para evitar que se vayan pero no promete nada.

Howard found an old book where an invocation is described, He must keep 12 confused souls at midnight in the room prepared for the ritual.  Howard will do what he can to keep them from leaving but promises nothing.

Controls:

Move - WASD

Talk - E

Select Option - 1234

Credits:

Design: Lodur, JesusLopezPujazon, guilty_D_games & Leoneking

Programming: Lodur, Leoneking & guilty_D_games

Art: JesusLopezPujazon

Audio: guilty_D_games
